summary: Refined all individual pages (projects.html, experience.html, skills.html, contact.html) to use third person narration, changing from first person to third person perspective. Updated headings to match the main page style and converted all personal pronouns and action verbs to third person format for consistency.
current_status: All website pages now use consistent third person narration, creating a unified professional voice throughout the site. Content maintains professional tone while presenting Bright's information from an external perspective.
